Usage: Filters¶

Still quite useful, this is a improved and evolved version of the original implementation of the django-uni-form project.

Using the filter (Easy and fun!)¶

  1. Add {% load uni_form_filters %} to the template that calls your form.

  2. Append your form call with the as_uni_form filter:

    {{ my_form|as_uni_form }}

  3. Add the class of ‘uniForm’ to your form. Example:

    <form action="" method="post" class="uniForm">

  4. Refresh and enjoy!

To see this more clearly:

{% extends "uni_form" %}

<form method="post" class="uniForm">

    {{ my_form|as_uni_form }}

</form>
